internal.content:
---
title: Explore Edge Application Manager
description: None
tabs: ['English', 'Deutsch', 'Espanol']
---

<PageDescription>

In this section you will get familar with the IBM Edge Application Manager (IEAM) user interface and the basic concepts.

</PageDescription>

## Using the Management Console

1. Go to the IBM Edge Application Manager (IEAM) console by browsing to **https://<cluster-url>/edge**, where **<cluster-url>** is the external ingress of the IEAM management hub cluster provided by the lab instructors.

    ![IEAM Login](../images/ieam-login.png)

2. Log in with your user credentials, also provided by the instructors.

<InlineNotification kind="info">

**Note:** Supported browers are:
- Mozilla Firefox → latest version
- Google Chrome → latest version

others may work but are not testet

</InlineNotification>

## Exploring the Management Console

After the login to the home screen you can follow the link in the Welcome to IBM Edge Application Manager info box to first steps or enter the following url if you closed the the info box already - **https://<cluster-url>/edge/start**
![ieam-getting-startet](../images/ieam-getting-startet.png)

Here you find information about whats new in the current release of how to do things like add a node, add a service, deploy a server or manage your environment.

Take some time to explore the page.

You will learn about the topics on the getting startet page during this lab, so lets continue to the dashboard either by clickung the **Go to dashboard** link or selecting **Home** in the menue on the top left.

## The dashboard

On the dashboard you get an overview of the
* Nodes
* Services
* Pattern
* Políticas
visible to you in your organisation.

You can choose between different visualisation options (e.g. chart, tiles, list)

Take some time to get familar with the UI and look at the different tabs and options.

<PageDescription>

In this section you will get familar with the IBM Edge Application Manager (IEAM) user interface and the basic concepts.

</PageDescription>

## Using the Management Console

1. Go to the IBM Edge Application Manager (IEAM) console by browsing to **https://<cluster-url>/edge**, where **<cluster-url>** is the external ingress of the IEAM management hub cluster provided by the lab instructors.

    ![IEAM Login](../images/ieam-login.png)

2. Log in with your user credentials, also provided by the instructors.

<InlineNotification kind="info">

**Note:** Supported browers are:
- Mozilla Firefox → latest version
- Google Chrome → latest version

others may work but are not testet

</InlineNotification>

## Exploring the Management Console

After the login to the home screen you can follow the link in the Welcome to IBM Edge Application Manager info box to first steps or enter the following url if you closed the the info box already - **https://<cluster-url>/edge/start**
![ieam-getting-startet](../images/ieam-getting-startet.png)

Here you find information about whats new in the current release of how to do things like add a node, add a service, deploy a server or manage your environment.

Take some time to explore the page.

You will learn about the topics on the getting startet page during this lab, so lets continue to the dashboard either by clickung the **Go to dashboard** link or selecting **Home** in the menue on the top left.

## The dashboard

On the dashboard you get an overview of the
* Nodes
* Services
* Pattern
* Políticas
visible to you in your organisation.

You can choose between different visualisation options (e.g. chart, tiles, list)

Take some time to get familar with the UI and look at the different tabs and options.
